title: Syncing Address Book With Google Contacts
content:
I want the Thunderbird Address Book to automatically sync with my Google contacts. What is the best way to accomplish this?

James
creator: JamesJ

title: Restore access to email account
content: I have two accounts with sbcglobal.net. One is still working when I use Mozilla Thunderbird to access my emails. The other just stopped working today. I can neither send nor receive my email messages in Thunderbird. I spoke to a sbcglobal.net rep and they said to contact Thunderbird, as the message I am getting says server error. Since I can access both accounts via the Internet, it is not sbcglobal.net's problem. The rep also mentioned that blocks of email accounts are being updated on their servers. Maybe Thunderbird needs to reconnect with yahoo and at&t, etc.???
creator: rexss

title: CHANGE
content: I don't want to upgrade to the new version of THUNDERBIRD

title: Where is the Search Function?
content: Before the "New" Tbird, there used to be a place to type in search terms, but now it's gone. Is it hidden somewhere? And please don't recite keyboard shortcuts to me, I want the simple easy to use search function I have always had. Thanks!
creator: tsb98003

title: Thunderbird Tools menu has Run Filter on Folders  and Delete Mail Marked as Junk  greyed out.
content:
Thunderbird Tools menu has Run Filter on Folders and Delete Mail Marked as Junk greyed out.

Thuderbird was working fine until the latest update was applied. Now the following has occured.

1. Several folders and their subfolders and emails have vanished. 2. None of the message filters that were working are working. Yes the fileres are enabled checked and "Run selected filter(s) on:" is set to the inbox connected to my email address. 3. The Tools-> Run Filter on Folders is greyed out 4. The Tools-> Delete Mail Marked as Junk is greyed out

I have seached the web for help and I have looked for settings that may need to be checked or set but have found nothing that helped.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.
creator: silcf

title: How do I stop the automatic syncronization of a paticular folder?
content:
I don't like the notification icon appearing by the junk email folder because I don't like being reminded of junk mail, but want to be able to check the folder every now and then to see if I was missing something. I have the second checkbox in this screen disabled, so one would think that would turn off the synchronization, but it doesn't.

Interestingly, I have two user created folders called "ADI" and "Amazon" which after checking that option, the notification icon for those folders appears when new emails are received. Why am I still receiving notifications for this folder in this case?
creator: gsrgtrdg4565653
